titleStmt.title: The two great mysteries of Christian religion the ineffable Trinity, [the] vvonderful incarnation, explicated to the satisfaction of mans own naturall reason, and according to the grounds of philosophy / by G. G. G.
titleStmt.author: Goodman, Godfrey, 1583-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
